snippet: Federal court asked to enforce a subpoena against Attorney General Eric H. Holder Jr., demanding that he produce records on the bungled gun-tracking investigation known as Operation Fast and Furious.
abstract: Republican-led House of Representatives asks a federal court to enforce a subpoena against Attorney General Eric H Holder Jr, demanding that he produce records on the bungled gun-tracking investigation known as Operation Fast and Furious.
lead_paragraph: Federal court asked to enforce a subpoena against Attorney General Eric H. Holder Jr., demanding that he produce records on the bungled gun-tracking investigation known as Operation Fast and Furious.

headline.seo: House Seeks Enforcement of Subpoena Against Eric Holder
headline.main: House Seeks Enforcement of Subpoena Against Holder
headline.print_headline: House Seeks Enforcement of Subpoena Against Holder
